sourceMeaningMnemonic: Cut this <radical>comb</radical> up with your <radical>weapon</radical> and turn it into the <kanji>steps</kanji> for some <kanji>stairs</kanji>.
meaningInfo: When you think about it, a comb is like a ladder. So if you cut all the rungs off with your weapon and put them on the ground, they turn into stairs!
readingMnemonic: You slowly work to create these <kanji>stairs</kanji>, you have to slice up a lot of combs, and at <reading>dawn</reading> (<ja>だん</ja>) they are done!
readingInfo: Imagine standing at the top of the stairs you made yourself, looking down at the entire town below you, as the light of dawn breaks and fills everything before you with light. And now more people can see this beautiful sight if they climb your steps.
